name: Bird Assassin
description: Birds murdered your Pa! His final wishes are for vengeance. Take your Pa's rifle and kill as many birds as you can to avenge his death. Battle a variety of enemies and bosses on your quest to kill the bird that murdered your Pa.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I loved this game ever since it's release on the xbox live indie game market and I was glad to see it on steam so I instantly bought it. It took me 50 minutes to beat this game and I bought every upgrade in that time. This game isn't meant to impress it is surely made for entertainment and some laughs for a whole two dollars.

wow. from the time i bought it, downloaded it, and played it from start to finish, NOT EVEN AN HOUR WENT BY. just, wow. funny game, stupid concept, VERY short 'story', and i don't really know if it was worth the $0.99 spent on it. i'll 'recommend' it, but your choice based on this review..
Lmao. You shoot birds. Get Paid. Buy guns. Shoot more birds. Get paid.  Upgrade.  Kill birds... yeah. Slaughter all the birds possible. Best two dollars spent ever.
Some of the birds are terrorists - Suicide bombers!   Not bad for 0,99€.
A Suprisingly fun game about revenging your fathers death caused by a ostrich... wait what the ****

I always read reviews before buying games and i eventually decided to by this after debating with myself. But its only £ 1.59 and is one of the best games i own!! STOP WONDERING WETHER TO BUY THIS AND DO IT!!

Bird Assassin is one of those games that doesn't look like much on paper or screenshots but then it comes along and kicks you in the teeth. It's superb and everything you could want in a shooter.          YouTube™ Video:  ➜ A Quick Look @ 'Bird Assassin' + 3 Steam keys to Giveaway! (ENDED)
This hands down is probably the funnest time wasting games ever. PLZ ADD DLC

if it flys, it dies
For only .99 it was worth the 90 minutes of playtime.

This game is pretty nice if you want to kill time, though it's a bit a waste of money: you can finish it in one hour, more or less, and I believe it's more convenient as online flash game or for mobile phones.  All you have to do is revenge the murder of your father, killed by a psychopathic ostrich. During the game you can get new rifles and shotguns, more and more powerful (it's even possible to purchase a minigun!), leading an incredible bird hunt. Shoot pigeons, ducks, cormorants, hens, turkeys, kamikaze birds, owls and ostrichs until you don't get to your main prey.  Well, the finale is predictable, isn't it? You manage to avenge your father, yahoo!, now he can rest in peace etc.  So, if you want to play it, I suggest you to eliminate save data, or you'll get bored very soon.

Birds: Check. Guns: Check. Blood: Check. Simple: Check. Fun: Check.  While the replay value of this game is null, and one hour is enough to beat it and buy everything on the store, this is a game worth playing.

This was worth an hour of my time and it was only a dollar. If you buy this game, I highly recommend that you play it on the hard difficulty to fully experience the game because normal difficulty is WAY too easy.

This was included in a Humble Bundle (or Indie Gala, or Indie Royale, etc.) so paid less than the $2 Steam asking price. From start to completion in 49 minutes (which probably could have been shorter if I didn't go a bit stupid in a few places). The voice acting is terrible, the graphics are undoubtedly 'indie' and it doesn't integrate particularly well with Steam (overlay, etc.), but nonetheless it's mindless fun to kill time.
Pretty much the best game
Very funny and intertaining little game, very quick and repetitive.
I’m so hungry, I’d eat the balls off a low flying duck!

After three levels you can pretty much buy the mini gun. Plain sailing through the ten levels after that. A fun game to start and finish on my lunch break, but really seems like this is better off as something free on one of those flash media websites. Satisfying to blast huge endless fields of birds in the three 10s bonus levels, but too short a rush. Should be a survival mode in it. If it's on sale for less than half a dollar, go for it, otherwise  FOG.com  it.

Don't buy the game.  The reasons for this a very simple. Instead of just shooting lots of birds with different guns you have a platformer. An jump mechanics are broken in a very simple way - whenever you press the jump button on the keyboard, you don't jump. Or you do a token jump. or you do the full jump. Or you jump but stop moving.  The game is broken. Don't buy.
